sentences.english: Mr. Anderson was writing a book on the history of Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 安得森先生正在写一本关于丹麦历史的书。

sentences.english: We have listened to Danish and spoken it from childhood. It is the joy of recognition we experience.
sentences.chinese: 我们从小就听说丹麦语，这是我们经历认同感的快乐。

sentences.english: The languages of Denmark and Norway both have similar words.
sentences.chinese: 在丹麦和挪威语中也有类似的词语。

sentences.english: The key to Danish anti-depression is to have low expectations .
sentences.chinese: 丹麦人战胜沮丧情绪的关键在于期望要低。

sentences.english: So he wanted to know, “How did you know I speak Danish?”
sentences.chinese: 所以他想知道，“你是怎么知道我说丹麦语的？”

sentences.english: A self-governing colony of denmark on the faro e islands.
sentences.chinese: 法罗群岛上的自治丹麦殖民地。

sentences.english: Sixty thousand Prussians invaded Denmark in February.
sentences.chinese: 六万普鲁士人于二月入侵了丹麦。

sentences.english: Indeed, we of spear-Danes in the old days.
sentences.chinese: 的确，我们关于持矛的丹麦人，在旧日。

sentences.english: He is, without any question, the best known writer Denmark has ever produced.
sentences.chinese: 他无疑是丹麦史所产生的最负盛名的作家。

sentences.english: Denmark's territory includes the Faeroe Islands and Greenland in the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦领土包括北极圈内的法罗群岛和格陵兰岛。

sentences.english: Denmark is home to the world's largest wind turbine manufacturer, Vestas.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦是世界最大风力涡轮机制造商维斯塔斯的家乡。

sentences.english: Danes are taught not to stand out in a crowd①.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦人所受的教育是在人群中不要显得鹤立鸡群。

sentences.english: The water surrounding these islands is often referred to as the Danish Archipelago.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿附近的水域通常被认为属于丹麦群岛的范围。

sentences.english: Few people know Danish in our school.
sentences.chinese: 在我们学校几乎没有人懂得丹麦语。

sentences.english: One of the most comprehensive studies comes from Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 最出色的研究之一来自于丹麦的研究。
